thread.title: Has the Glastonbury Festival 2017 line-up been leaked? Website posts acts before it's officially announced
thread.title_full: Has the Glastonbury Festival 2017 line-up been leaked? Website posts acts before it's officially announced

author: Vicki Newman
title: Has the Glastonbury Festival 2017 line-up been leaked? Website posts acts before it's officially announced
text:
If this really is the Glastonbury line-up, it would be one amazing weekend (Photo: Getty Images) Share Get celebs   Could   
Has the line-up for this year's Glastonbury Festival just been leaked? 
Organisers are yet to announce any of the acts playing at this year's event, but we may have just found out who's taking to the stage. 
The website Clashfinder has published details of bands set to play at this year's festival, with acts listed for the Pyramid Stage and four other areas of the site. 
It should be noted that Clashfinder is a publicly edited site and its list of acts may not be wholly reliable. All times listed below are estimated and the line-up may be subject to change. Read More Is this the line-up? (Photo: BBC) 
The Glastonbury Festival has not issued any comment on the line-up information released on Clashfinder on Sunday. 
With that in mind, if you have tickets for Glastonbury this year, this is what you could be seeing in just over three months' time: Friday, June 23
